title: Delhi News Live: Running bulldozers not a solution… no need to do ‘dadagiri’, says CM after meet on anti-encroachment drives - The Indian Express
content:

description: Delhi News Today Live Updates 16 May, Delhi Weather Today, Delhi Covid-19 Cases Updates, Delhi Heatwave Updates,  Delhi Temperature News: It was 45.6 degrees Celsius which is the highest for this year on Sunday.
